data.text: Adiera bad Jehova Nyasaye ok chiek ma ok dores joge,
To richou ema osepogou gi Nyasachu;
Nimar lwetu otimo remo,
Onge ngʼama dwaro tim makare;
Gibutno e tong thuonde,
Mbui margi ok nyal twangʼ-go nanga,
Tiendegi reto kadhi timo richo;
Ok gingʼeyo yo makelo kwe,
Omiyo ngʼado bura makare koro bor kodwa,
Wamulo kor udi mana ka muofni,
Walak mana ka ondiegi
Nimar timbewa mamono opongʼo wangʼi
ngʼanyo kendo ketho e nyim Jehova Nyasaye,
Omiyo ngʼado bura makare ogol oko
Adiera ok nyal yudi,
Ne oneno kaonge ngʼato kata achiel,
Norwakore tim makare ka law akor mar nyinyo,
Obiro chulo ngʼato ka ngʼato mana moromore gi timbene,
Koa yo podho chiengʼ, ji noluor nying Jehova Nyasaye,
Jehova Nyasaye wacho niya,

Jehova Nyasaye wacho niya, “Akwongʼora ni ma e singruokna kodgi. Roho mara man kuomu kod wechena ma aseketo e dhou nosik kodu chakre kawuono nyaka tiengʼ mabiro bangʼu koa kuom nyikwau kadhi nyaka kuom nyithindgi, wach ok nowuogi e dhog-gi ndalo duto nyaka chiengʼ,” Jehova Nyasaye ema owacho.
